headline: Pharma Stock Roundup: EU Nod to Expanded Use of ABBV, AZN Drugs & More
summary: EU approves expanded use of ABBV's Rinvoq and AZN's Imfinzi and Enhertu. NVS set to invest $23B to boost U.S. manufacturing.

headline: Here’s Why Clearbridge Growth Strategy Sold AbbVie (ABBV)
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Growth Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. First quarter of 2025 witnessed sharp equities sell off due to the shift out of mega caps. There was a relative outperformance of mid cap growth stocks over large and […]
